protein.specific_function: Calcium/calmodulin-dependent protein kinase belonging to a proposed calcium-triggered signaling cascade. May regulate calcium-mediated granulocyte function. May play a role in apoptosis of erythroleukemia cells. Activates MAP kinase MAPK3. In vitro, phosphorylates transcription factor CREM isoform Beta and probably CREB1

reference.reference_text: Ishikawa Y, Tokumitsu H, Inuzuka H, Murata-Hori M, Hosoya H, Kobayashi R: Identification and characterization of novel components of a Ca2+/calmodulin-dependent protein kinase cascade in HeLa cells. FEBS Lett. 2003 Aug 28;550(1-3):57-63.
Verploegen S, Lammers JW, Koenderman L, Coffer PJ: Identification and characterization of CKLiK, a novel granulocyte Ca(++)/calmodulin-dependent kinase. Blood. 2000 Nov 1;96(9):3215-23.
